com.percussion.services.assembly.jexl
Class PSDateUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSJexlUtilBase
      com.percussion.services.assembly.jexl.PSDateUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSJexlExpression
public class PSDateUtils
extends PSJexlUtilBase

Date utilities, primarily for determining spans of time from a passed in date value. Meant to work with the velocity tools date object.

Author:
dougrand

@IPSJexlMethod(description="get a date value, representing the beginning of the week specified by the passed date, set at 12:00:00.000AM",

The offset can be positive or negative.")})
